mapper.select: select u.id userId, u.user_name,r.realname, u.gender, c.id category, s.phone, w.c_total, r.ID_number idNumber, s.email from u_user u left join u_e_wallet w on w.user_id = u.id left join u_category c on u.category_id = c.id left join u_safe s on u.id = s.user_id left join u_realname r on s.rn_id = r.id
